summary: Makes ore veins never run out.
descriptionHtml:
Mine the same way other NPC's mine, never have an ore vein dry up again.

Instead of getting a set amount of ore, every in-game hour of mining will earn an ore.

Time needed to mine an ore is reduced by 30 seconds for every level in two handed, capped to a reduction of 59 minutes (so any level uncapper mods shouldn't break this one).

A small amount of experience given to two handed for every ore mined.
author: Lookatthesea
